chart_metadata.name: kubernetes-reflector
chart_metadata.description: Kubernetes-Reflector is a Kubernetes addon designed to monitor and reflect changes to secrets and configmaps across namespaces

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: 1000m means 1 hyperthread. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: RAM
attrs.description: 1Gi means 1 Gibibyte RAM. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: 1000m means 1 hyperthread. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: RAM
attrs.description: 1Gi means 1 Gibibyte RAM. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: (Advanced) Type of Storage
attrs.description: Sets the persistence type

attrs.label: Host Device Path
attrs.description: Path to the device on the host system

attrs.label: Container Device Path
attrs.description: Path inside the container the device is mounted

attrs.label: Service Type
attrs.description: ClusterIP's are only internally available and Loadbalancer exposes the service using the system loadbalancer

attrs.label: LoadBalancer IP
attrs.description: MetalLB Only: Selects the Loadbalancer IP to expose on. Required when using PortalButton with MetalLB

subquestions.label: Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
subquestions.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates. Cannot be used combined with tls option below

subquestions.label: Traefik Middlewares
subquestions.description: Add previously created Traefik Middlewares to this Ingress

subquestions.label: Show Advanced Settings
subquestions.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

subquestions.label: (Advanced) Traefik Entrypoint
subquestions.description: Entrypoint used by Traefik when using Traefik as Ingress Provider

attrs.label: Use Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
attrs.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates.

attrs.label: Cluster Certificate (Advanced)
attrs.description: Add the name of your cluster-wide certificate, that you set up in the ClusterIssuer chart.

attrs.label: Authentication Username (Optional)
attrs.description: Authentication Username, Optional

attrs.label: Authentication Password
attrs.description: Authentication Credentials

attrs.label: Authentication Key
attrs.description: Provide an auth key to automatically authenticate the node as your user account.

attrs.label: Auth Once
attrs.description: Only attempt to log in if not already logged in.

attrs.label: Accept DNS
attrs.description: Accept DNS configuration from the admin console.

attrs.label: Userspace
attrs.description: Userspace Networking mode allows running Tailscale where you do not have access to create a VPN tunnel device.

attrs.label: Routes
attrs.description: Expose physical subnet routes to your entire Tailscale network.

attrs.label: Destination IP
attrs.description: Tells the DNAT mechanism which Destination IP to set in the IP header, and where to send packets that are matched.

attrs.label: Sock5 Server
attrs.description: The address on which to listen for SOCKS5 proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.label: Outbound HTTP Proxy Listen
attrs.description: The address on which to listen for HTTP proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.label: Extra Args
attrs.description: Extra Args

attrs.label: Tailscale Daemon Extra Args
attrs.description: Tailscale Daemon Extra Args

attrs.label: Killswitch Excluded IPv4 networks
attrs.description: List of Killswitch Excluded IPv4 Addresses

attrs.label: Killswitch Excluded IPv6 networks
attrs.description: List of Killswitch Excluded IPv6 Addresses

1.0.7.app_readme:
Kubernetes-Reflector is a Kubernetes addon designed to monitor and reflect changes to secrets and configmaps across namespaces

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/enterprise/kubernetes-reflector

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
1.0.7.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
